sources.content:
export * from "./wrap.style"
export type { WrapProps } from "./wrap"
export { useWrapPropsContext, Wrap, WrapPropsContext } from "./wrap"

sources.name: wrap.style.ts
wrap.tsx
sources.content:
"use client"

import type { ThemeProps, WithoutThemeProps } from "@yamada-ui/react"
import type { FlexProps } from "../flex"
import type { WrapStyle } from "./wrap.style"
import { createComponent } from "@yamada-ui/react"
import { Flex } from "../flex"
import { wrapStyle } from "./wrap.style"

export interface WrapProps
  extends WithoutThemeProps<FlexProps, WrapStyle>,
    ThemeProps<WrapStyle> {}

const {
  PropsContext: WrapPropsContext,
  usePropsContext: useWrapPropsContext,
  withContext,
} = createComponent<WrapProps, WrapStyle>("wrap", wrapStyle)

export { useWrapPropsContext, WrapPropsContext }

/**
 * `Wrap` is a component that has `wrap` set on `Flex`. It inherits convenient style shorthand from `Flex`.
 *
 * @see https://yamada-ui.com/components/wrap
 */
export const Wrap = withContext<"div", WrapProps>(Flex)()
